text: Knema pedicellata is a species of plant in the family Myristicaceae. It is a tree endemic to Borneo. ==References== * World Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998. Knema pedicellata. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. title: Knema pedicellata
